scripts.format: pnpm run format-prettier && pnpm run format-eslint
scripts.format-prettier: pnpm run format-prettier-typescript && pnpm run format-prettier-javascript
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint-tsc && pnpm run lint-eslint && pnpm run lint-file-dependencies && pnpm run lint-prettier
scripts.lint-prettier: pnpm run lint-prettier-typescript && pnpm run lint-prettier-javascript
scripts.prepare-local-components: dotenv -e ../../.env -- sh -c 'COMPONENTS_PATH=${LOCAL_COMPONENTS_PATH:-../../../components}; pnpm --prefix "$COMPONENTS_PATH" run build && pnpm uninstall @alextheman/components && pnpm install file:"$COMPONENTS_PATH"'
scripts.use-live-components: pnpm run refresh-live-components && pnpm --dir ../../ run dev
scripts.use-local-components: pnpm run refresh-local-components && pnpm --dir ../../ run dev-after-refresh
